attributes.action: Open a public enquire before the introduction of COVID-Passports.
attributes.additional_details:
This government is trying to rewrite the social contract by using this pandemic as an evil that justifies the means – as free agencies, we cannot allow that to happen.

The Covid-Passport will simply serve to divide the country further and create a newer layer of discrimination in the UK. As a democratic nation, we have a moral obligation to do better and be an example to all countries seeking guidance in these troubled times. 

We are calling the government to stop the COVID-PASSPORT trials.
attributes.background: The Covid-Passports are immoral, and it goes against our fundamental Human Rights. Therefore, we want the government to recognise our freedom to choose whether to participate in the COVID-Passport as a collective or not.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you want an inquiry or a ban on passports.

There is already a Parliamentary inquiry into passports, which you can read about here:

https://committees.parliament.uk/work/1104/covid-19-vaccine-certification/

You might also like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957
